DGLDF.long_name: VelocityShares 3x Inverse Gold ETN Linked to the S&P GSCI Gold Index ER
DGLDF.summary:
The investment seeks to replicate, net of expenses, three times the opposite (inverse) of the S&P GSCI Gold index ER.
 The index comprises futures contracts on a single commodity. The fluctuations in the values of it are intended generally to correlate with changes in the price of gold in global markets.

DGZ.short_name: DB Gold Short ETN due February
DGZ.summary:
The investment seeks to replicate, net of expenses, the inverse of the daily performance of the Deutsche Bank Liquid Commodity index - Optimum Yield Gold Excess Return.
 The index is intended to reflect changes in the market value of certain gold futures contracts and is comprised of a single unfunded gold futures contract.

DSLVF.long_name: VelocityShares 3x Inverse Silver ETN Linked to the S&P GSCI Silver Index ER
DSLVF.summary:
The investment seeks to replicate, net of expenses, three times the opposite (inverse) of the S&P GSCI Silver index ER.
 The index comprises futures contracts on a single commodity. The fluctuations in the values of it are intended generally to correlate with changes in the price of silver in global markets.

DZZ.short_name: DB Gold Double Short ETN due Fe
DZZ.summary:
The investment seeks to replicate, net of expenses, twice of the inverse of the daily performance of the Deutsche Bank Liquid Commodity index - Optimum Yield Gold Excess Return.
 The index is intended to reflect changes in the market value of certain gold futures contracts and is comprised of a single unfunded gold futures contract.

GDXD.long_name: MicroSectors Gold Miners -3X Inverse Leveraged ETNs
GDXD.summary:
The investment seeks the return on the notes is linked to a three times leveraged participation in the daily inverse performance of the S-Network MicroSectorsTM Gold Miners Index.
The index is a total return index that tracks the performance of two exchange traded funds, the VanEck VectorsÂ® Gold Miners ETF (the âGDXâ) and the VanEck VectorsÂ® Junior Gold Miners ETF (the âGDXJâ).

GLL.summary:
The investment seeks daily investment results, before fees and expenses, that correspond to two times the inverse (-2x) of the daily performance of the Bloomberg Gold SubindexSM.
 The fund seeks to meet its investment objective by investing under normal market conditions in any one of, or combinations of, Financial Instruments (including swap agreements, futures contracts and forward contracts) based on the fundâs benchmark.

KOLD.summary:
The investment seeks daily investment results, before fees and expenses, that correspond to two times the inverse (-2x) of the daily performance of the Bloomberg Natural Gas SubindexSM.
 The fund seeks to meet their investment objectives by investing in Natural Gas futures contracts. It may also invest in swaps if the market for a specific futures contract experiences emergencies (e.g., natural disaster, terrorist attack, or an act of God) or disruptions (e.g., a trading halt or a flash crash) or in situations where the Sponsor deems it impractical or inadvisable to buy or sell futures contracts (such as during periods of market volatility or illiquidity).

SCO.summary:
The investment seeks daily investment results, before fees and expenses, that correspond to two times the inverse (-2x) of the daily performance of the Bloomberg WTI Crude Oil SubindexSM.
 The fund seeks to meet its investment objective by investing, under normal market conditions, in any one of, or combinations of, Financial Instruments (including swap agreements, futures contracts, forward contracts, and option contracts) based on WTI sweet, light crude oil. It will not invest directly in oil.
